spectrum.help: Convolutes singlet spectrum with gaussian or lorentzian function

lower.help: lower bound of spectrum in eV

upper.help: upper bound of spectrum in eV

points.help: datapoints between upper and lower to calculate

minexc.help: lowest exciton to include in spectrum

maxexc.help: highest exciton to include in spectrum

shift.help: shift spectrum by amount of eV
